description:
Tenma and the gang head out for a picnic, but someone forgot to pack the food! Harima and Hanai don’t mind roughing it when they turn the mishap into a cook-off challenge. Later, Harima’s on another hunt - for a job.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fight, Hunter! / Fight, Eater! / Fight, Part-Time Worker!
Tatakae, Hunter! / Tatakae, Eater! / Tatakae, Arbeiter!
闘え, ハンター! / 闘え, イーター! / 闘え, アルバイター!
